s.text: In order to move forward, Janet Dietrich will be meeting with me when I go to Houston next Thursday.

Message-ID: <28574048.1075852650572.JavaMail.evans@thyme> Date: Fri, 20 Jul 2001 10:59:25 -0700 (PDT) From: kevinscott@onlinemailbox.net To: skean@enron.com Subject: Moving foward at a good clip Cc: jeff.skilling@enron.com Mime-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ANSI_X3.4-1968 Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit Bcc: jeff.skilling@enron.com
